item.title: Programmers commonly used drawing software and tips
item.description: Programmers need to deal with lots of diagrams in their daily life: flowcharts, architecture diagrams, interaction diagrams, functional module diagrams, UML class diagrams, deployment diagrams, various visual diagrams, and so on.
